name: I Saw Mom Kissing Santa Claus
name_original: I Saw Mom Kissing Santa Claus
description:
An awkward conversation with your dad...who just so happens to be Santa!

Make choices that affect the conversation, and uncover the story in the process!

Use the space bar or mouse button. Play the game multiple times to see everything.

Just keep in mind -- nobody ever said saying the right thing would be easy. I mean, technically, you don't even have to be present in the conversation.

That's what smartphones were invented for.

PLEASE NOTE

This game is a prototype that was made for the Extra Credits Holiday Jam 2018. It lacks animation, music, and most of its graphics, but the story's all there and worth playing.

Other Info

Estimated run time: 5-10 minutes per playthrough

The Windows download below is the original jam entry, as the Web version was uploaded after the deadline. However, no code or assets were changed between the two.
